MainPage.Title: Manage your inventory with ease
MainPage.SubTitle: Our tool simplifies inventory management. Keep control of your stock easily.

Reviews.Review4: Very efficient and easy to use.
Reviews.Review7: I will continue using this service.

Content1.Title: Choose the perfect plan for you
Content1.Text1: We know that every business has unique needs regarding inventory management. That's why we offer a variety of plans that cater to different business sizes and operational complexities. Whether you are starting with a small inventory or managing a large warehouse, we have the right solution for you.
Content1.Text2: Consider factors such as the volume of your products and the integration with other systems you use. Choosing the right plan not only optimizes your operations but also allows you to maintain precise and efficient control of your inventory, reducing costs and improving customer satisfaction.

Content2.Title: Create your Inventory from Scratch or Import with Excel
Content2.Text1: With our inventory management tool, you have the flexibility to create your inventory from scratch or import it easily using Excel. This allows you to get started quickly regardless of the current state of your inventory.
Content2.Text2: If you decide to create your inventory from scratch, our intuitive interface will guide you through each step, ensuring that all your products are well categorized and organized. From adding detailed descriptions to setting stock levels, everything is designed to be simple and efficient.
Content2.Text3: For those who already have an existing inventory, we offer an Excel import option that will allow you to load all your information in a matter of seconds. Simply download our template, complete the details of your inventory, and upload it.

Content3.Title: Create and Manage Users with Custom Permissions
Content3.Text1: Our platform allows you to create users and manage their permissions easily. You can assign specific roles such as Administrator and Reader.
Content3.Text2: Administrators can control everything: add, modify, and delete data. Readers can only view information without making changes.
Content3.Text3: Configure permissions to keep your information secure. Our intuitive interface allows you to add users and modify roles as per your needs.

Tech.Title: Our tech stack
Tech.Description: At Stockify, we use a combination of modern and robust technologies to provide high-quality and high-performance solutions. Our tech stack includes:

.NET.Name: .NET
.NET.Description: A software development platform for applications and services.

React.Name: React
React.Description: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces.

JWT.Name: JWT
JWT.Description: JSON Web Tokens for secure authentication.

Tailwind CSS.Name: Tailwind CSS
Tailwind CSS.Description: A CSS framework for creating modern and responsive designs.

EmailJs.Name: EmailJs
EmailJs.Description: An email service for sending and receiving emails efficiently.

ChartJs.Name: ChartJs
ChartJs.Description: A JavaScript library for creating interactive charts.

Docker.Name: Docker
Docker.Description: A platform for developing, shipping, and running applications in containers.

AWS.Name: AWS
AWS.Description: Amazon Web Services, a cloud services platform.

Kubernetes.Name: Kubernetes
Kubernetes.Description: A container orchestration system for automating deployment, scaling, and management of applications.

GitHub.Name: GitHub
GitHub.Description: A platform for version control and collaboration in software development, using Git.

Redux.Name: Redux
Redux.Description: A JavaScript library for managing application state, commonly used with React.

i18n.Name: i18n
i18n.Description: i18next is an internationalization framework written in and for JavaScript.

AboutUs.Title: About Us
AboutUs.Description: At Stockify, we are dedicated to revolutionizing inventory management. Our goal is to provide innovative solutions that allow businesses to optimize their operations and reach new levels of efficiency. With a focus on advanced technology and ease of use, our services are designed to meet the needs of businesses of all sizes.

Vision.Title: Our Vision
Vision.Text: We aspire to be leaders in inventory management solutions, helping businesses reduce costs, improve accuracy, and increase productivity. We believe that efficient inventory management is key to the success of any business.

Project.Title: Our Project
Project.Text: Stockify offers an intuitive and powerful platform that integrates data analytics to provide real-time information. Our project is constantly evolving, incorporating feedback from our users to improve and adapt to the changing demands of the market.
